column4: Hi.  I use archlinux, not ubuntu, but I was wondering if someone could confirm something which I suspect is universal.  Has anyone here compared EXA performance vs. XAA performance with an intel 915gm card or related?  On my computer, EXA is a bit laggier/draws slowly when viewing youtube or changing windows, while XAA is perfect.
there are options that make exa as fast and even better than xaa
I'm checking out bugs for EXA on freedesktop.org right now :D
and you get xv video playing back again :)
do you perchance have a link or some recommended keywords for a search? ;)
that is an excellent bug title ;)
the ubuntu bugtracker is sexy O_O
ok I found my seeking DAAP client. It's rhythmbox. Now I just have to bother them with pre-buffering of next song
thanks a lot, this has been bothering me for a while! :D
if you have success report it on the bug report :)
